text: Workday is a leading provider
for enterprise cloud applications
for finance and human resources.
As Workday grows its footprint globally,

it was imperative for us to
deploy in different regions
to meet our customer needs.
With AWS and public cloud,
we've deployed in six different regions.

We are now migrating,
co-innovating, and co-selling

to help our customers
meet their requirements,

and our partnership is
just growing further.

By moving our customers
to public cloud and AWS,
our customers can enjoy

the elimination of
three-hour downtime window.

It gives them a near-zero
downtime experience for a weekly
and monthly maintenance cadence.
This also allows customers globally

to leverage the regional
maintenance windows.

The other big benefit
is it allows to meet,
data residency requirements

for our customers in
different parts of the globe.

And finally, meet our compliance
regulatory requirements,
which is also critical,

which we are trying to solve
with AWS and public cloud.
